mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id,p.name,p.code,p.menu_id,p.remark FROM pub_permission p JOIN pub_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN pub_role r on rp.role_id = r.id JOIN pub_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id JOIN pub_user u on ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id,name,code,menu_id,remark FROM pub_permission WHERE code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id,name,code,menu_id,remark FROM pub_permission WHERE menu_id=#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT max(t.id) FROM PUB_PERMISSION t WHERE t.menu_id=#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
